archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Perform Supplier Billing
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Perform Supplier Party Billing process manages settlement of goods delivered as part of the Value Chain (Typically physical goods). Example includes simcards, Handset, marketing collaterals etc.

properties.value: Perform Supplier Party Billing process manages settlement of goods delivered as part of the Value Chain (Typically physical goods). Example includes simcards, Handset, marketing collaterals etc.
